# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0))ffshore , andpu omp (position (107.5, -33.5))

### Copper plate mine at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)) with no ingredients to smelt

### Water supply system
Consists of offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)), pipe group (fluid system 1334), and boiler (position (111.5, -32.0))

### Steam supply system
Consists of boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), pipe group (fluid system 1338), and steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5))

### Belt system
Consists of two belts (positions (63.5, -52.5) -> (63.5, -54.5) and (64.5, -52.5) -> (64.5, -54.5))

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when inserting coal into boiler: Ensure you have coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the boiler.
* Errors when boiler is out of fuel: Ensure the boiler has a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
* Errors when steam engine has no input liquid: Ensure the steam engine is connected to a fluid system with a sufficient liquid supply.
* Errors when pipe group is empty: Ensure the pipe group is connected to a fluid system with a sufficient fluid supply.

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* Important variables:
  + `transport-belt`: 8
  + `small-electric-pole`: 1
  + `wood`: 7
  + `iron-ore`: 10
  + `copper-ore`: 10
  + `iron-plate`: 7
  + `copper-plate`: 5
  + `copper-cable`: 2
  + `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
